verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: SEOUL , South Korea] — [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] [V: confirmed] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARG1: that a top North Korean official is headed to New York for talks on an upcoming summit between Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , as diplomatic efforts also accelerated in Asia] .

SEOUL , South Korea — U.S. President Donald Trump confirmed Tuesday that a top North Korean official [V: is] headed to New York for talks on an upcoming summit between Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , as diplomatic efforts also accelerated in Asia .

SEOUL , South Korea — U.S. President Donald Trump confirmed Tuesday that [ARG0: a top North Korean official] is [V: headed] [ARG1: to New York] [ARGM-PRP: for talks on an upcoming summit between Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] , [ARGM-TMP: as diplomatic efforts also accelerated in Asia] .

SEOUL , South Korea — U.S. President Donald Trump confirmed Tuesday that a top North Korean official is headed to New York for talks on an upcoming summit between Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , as [ARG1: diplomatic efforts] [ARGM-ADV: also] [V: accelerated] [ARGM-LOC: in Asia] .
